mdRecord.dcterms:title: Pascaarte Van't westlyckste deel vande Middelandsche-Zee: waer in vertoont wort de ware gelegentheden van alle rivieren, haven, Capen droogtÄ“ en bayen, alles synde op hare streckingen en distantien geleyt = Tabula hydrographica de partibus Occidentalioribus Maris Mediterranei

mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Includes decorative cartouche, rhumb lines, and indexes of islands. [original]
Scale given in: Duytsche mylen; Spaansche mylen; Fransche en Engelsche mylen. [original]
